metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17128 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The h264_slice_init function in libavcodec/h264_slice.c in Libav 12.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault and application crash) via a crafted file.

notes.Note: ebarretto> No fix available as of 2019-03-01

criterions.comment: libav package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
